description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints for root access, documentation, and application info.

classes.name: RootController
classes.description: A controller providing minimal root endpoints, including welcome messages, documentation redirects, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests at root '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/docs' and redirects users to Swagger UI for API documentation.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/api/info' and returns basic application information.
